text: Wo jiang shi naxie zai difang shang wangzizunda de ren liqi wo de jixiang, jishi tamen kanjian yi qie jixiang, tamen ye buxin ta; ruguo tamen kanjian zhengdao, tamen bu ba ta dang zuo daolu; ruguo tamen kanjian xiedao, tamen ba ta dang zuo daolu. Zhe shi yinwei tamen buxin wo de jixiang, erqie hushi ta
